page.title: 15RUNNING A HOTEL,WIGLEY
page.content: Guests at the New Forest Moat House usually stay only one night.They are mainly businessmen in winter and tourists,both British and foreign,in summer.More old people come than young Evening entertainment includes dinner dances and piano playing.Visitors can go horse riding easily at an adjacent riding school,run on 13acres of land rented from the hotel.There are special arrangements for children and pets are allowed in the rooms but not in the restaurant. The motel employs 50 people including 8 cooks,10 maids and one gardener,all living locally.The hotel has its own dog and three cats. There is no problem with noise from traffic especially since the M27 was built.In fact the motorway has caused a decrease in custom.
